body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joshua Ward and the customer's name is Andrea Torres.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Joshua Ward, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. Thank you for reaching out to us today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Andrea! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm actually looking to buy a new motorcycle, but I'm feeling a little overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Andrea. Choosing a motorcycle can be a big decision. What type of bike are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm thinking about a cruiser, but I'm not sure which model would be best for me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We have a great selection of cruisers! Before we dive into the details, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Andrea! And may I also have your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information! I will make sure you receive all the details about our cruisers. It was a pleasure speaking with you, Andrea. Is there anything else you would like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today, Andrea. Have a great day!
